body.name: Garment Steamer Ironing Glove with Finger Loop, Heat Resistant Waterproof Ironing Mitt for Heat Resistan Handheld Steamer, Garment Steamer Accessories for Clothes (Grey)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 hrs 49 mins
features: Insulation material:This mini hand-held ironing board is made of polyester on the outside and heat-resistant sponge on the inside to insulate the heat and protect your hands from steam burns. The mesh cover design on the back makes it easier for you to hold the ironing board with one hand.

Special design:The design of the built-in ring buckle,the ring can ensure that the gloves are firmly fixed,which helps to better protect your hands and avoid falling off,it is convenient to operate when ironing clothes.

Features: The size of this steam ironing glove is about 25cm*15cm*3.5cm, especially the pointed point is more convenient for ironing shirt/suit sleeves and collar. Easy ironing, flexible hand-held operation.

Easy to store and carry: With a hanging loop, when you are not using it, you only need to hang it up without taking up space, which is convenient for storage. The volume is smaller than a normal ironing board, and it can be carried with you when you travel.
Used widely:Ironing steamer glove is designed fit for all steam irons, such as fabric steamer, garment steamer, handheld garment steamer, travel garment steamers, standing fabric steamer etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Much smaller than depicted
reviews.reviewText: This is smaller than it seems in the images and therefore you can only steam small portions at a time. I could’ve just used my oven mitts.

reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not at all what I expected
reviews.reviewText: It doesn’t bend so it's like attaching a board to your hand and trying to steam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Okay, I guess.
reviews.reviewText: Arrived on time. I bought this for the steamer I bought to travel. I liked it but, I could use some longer hemline to cover my wrists. I got burned more than once, twice any more I'll need skin grafts!. Use cautiously and I did, it's super hot. TEL

reviews.reviewText: We use it for when we use steamer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: If you have a portable hand held steamer then you definitely need this…it helps out immensely when steaming your clothes…keeps your hands safe from the hot steam…it’s a must.!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works ok with some limitations
reviews.reviewText: Of course the steam can get really hot when using the steamer. This glove at the very least protects your hand and allows you to back up the material as you apply steam. If you can get to the area you are steaming and apply a little pressure on the opposite side with the glove it helps to "iron" out the wrinkles. It is a little bulky, the front is tapered which helps getting into some areas. However, it is 1 1/4 inch thick and the front while tapered does not come to much of a point. So there are some areas that you may not be able to reach. The back where you insert your hand under the mesh also has a loop for you finger to help stabilize it on your hand. So it is a good aid for your steaming that will aid you in most but not all areas because of it's shape and bulk. Overall a good product with only a few limitations at a great price.
A bit awkward to use but I like having the option.
